title: Hour 1: Durant Return?
description:
Keyshawn Johnson and Kendrick Perkins debate if the Warriors should be interested in trading for Kevin Durant. Ryan Clark joins the show to discuss if Lamar Jackson is making a mistake by betting on himself. Keyshawn and Ryan debate if the Big Ten or the SEC will be more prestigious following the expansion of their respective conference.

itunes:subtitle: First take Hour 1: Should the Warriors be interested in trading for Kevin Durant?
